review.comment:

eclipsewindowtint.ca
newindowfilms.ca

review.comment: Kal and Dillon at FirstPage have supported us in every way from the very beginning - like they are part of our in house sales & marketing team. This whole marketing thing...it's more than building a website - it's an ongoing relationship that we've come to rely on. Even in the midst of everything that is happening right now, FirstPage has pivoted with us on a moment by moment basis. So grateful for you guys!!

If you're looking for a company that is professional, personal, and does an amazing job, I'd recommend FirstPage Marketing.

review.comment:
Working with First Page is always a very pleasant experience. They really know what they are talking about and their design work is top notch.

Meetings with Carlos are always informative and fun!
Keep up the good work.

review.review_reply: Hi Susanne - it has been such as pleasure working with you over the years. Thank you kindly for the 5-star Google Review.

review.comment: We utilize FirstPage Marketing's services for our website hosting, maintenance, and marketing and are very happy with the proactive approach the team takes when it comes to getting us found online. Their responsiveness and willingness to collaborate on new ideas makes them a great partner in our online marketing efforts.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for the positive 5 star review! It's been a pleasure working alongside your team to develop the new website and help see your marketing efforts through. Looking forward to continued online success in the future!

review.comment: By far the most qualified, courteous staff in the business.  I have dealt with many other people in designing websites over the years. I have even built my own (back when it was simpler to do!).  I have never had such a quick response from a vendor in regards to building a website.  All information was explained, all pricing was transparent.  It took getting someone from across the country (I am in New York, they are in BC) for me to get the right people for the job.  I am happy with the end product, the product support, and most definitely my sales rep.  Amazing company.  Thanks for everything!
review.review_reply: Hi Eric - thank you so much for the positive Google review. It has been a pleasure getting to know you and working with you. Looking forward to working with you in the near future.

review.comment:
I used First Page Marketing to build a new webpage, SEO and AdWords campaigns. It's been a great experience and having built all my own webpages in the past, it was wonderful to deal with a team that is experienced to answer all my questions and offer constructive feedback in every phase of the project.

Everything was delivered to me in a realistic time frame and any changes or tweaks were adjusted in a timely manner. Marie kept me up to date and informed, communication was great.

I would definitely use them to build another webpage and anticipate continuing with their marketing services in the future.
review.review_reply: Hi Dustin - thank you so much the incredible review! We love hearing about client success stories such as yours. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to provide us with this feedback and we look forward to continuing to work with you in the future.

review.comment: Since working with FirstPage and Carlos we have seen a significant growth in our online leads as well as potential tenants choosing our business strictly because of the Google placement and the reviews.  Communication with this company is awesome!  Every email answered promptly and information and advice is always quickly provided.  I also love the honesty that comes from Carlos - if he thinks we don't need to spend money somewhere then he lets me know!  He is the professional after all!  If you looking to get more online business and a great plan to do so then this company is for you!
review.review_reply: Hi Tori - thank you so much for the kind words and for taking the time to review us on Google. We are very grateful to work with fantastic clients such as yourself. We look forward to helping your business continue to grow.

review.comment: Great group of people to work with.
The team at FirstPage really invest in whomever they are working with. The knowledge, time and energy is incredible and they are a great crew to work with and have on your side!
The perfect blend of talent, experience and integrity. Whether its web development, SEO or digital ads, this team gets results!

I started working with Carlos and the team at Firstpage Marketing in 2011 and have never looked back. My Ivanco Fitness website is over 3 years old and still produces hot leads from month to month with little to no maintenance. Marketing investments are some of the most important because they dictate the growth of your business. First Page Marketing has earned my trust by understanding my needs, taking me from consultation to design to implementation, delivering excellent results every time.
